5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“The Satan comes between the son of Adam and his soul, and he does not know how many Rak’ah he has prayed. If a person notices that, then let him prostrate twice before he says the Salam.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سَجْدَتَىِ السَّهْوِ قَبْلَ السَّلاَمِ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the two prostration of forgetfulness before the Salam
